all_response:
Jax: You need to soak the demon-slaying sword and the purple herb together for a day to obtain a purple demon-slaying sword. While there are no naturally occurring purple herbs in this world, crushing and mixing red and blue herbs together will produce a purple herb suitable for dyeing weapons. These two herbs can be found in the forests. After collecting the materials, you can go to the forge to craft the purple demon-slaying sword.
Jax: The critical red herb only grows in the primeval forest.
Jax: The blue sky herb can only be found in the tropical rainforest.
Jax: The Mysterious Forest grows atop some rich iron ore veins where you can obtain what you need to cast your sword. This is the only place you will find iron ore.
Jax: The demon annihilation crystal can be requested from Father Paul at the church.
Jax: Father Paul is the priest of St. Barnabas Church.

all_response:
Jax: You need to produce a large quantity of bows and arrows so you will need to find a factory to fulfill the production. Once produced, placing the finished bows and arrows into the holy water basin at the church to soak for a day and a night to obtain sacred bows and holy arrows. To produce a bow and arrow set requires a metal bow body, ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene bowstring, and silver arrows. Specialized factories are able to mass-produce these components, and then you will need to take them to a forge for assembly yourself.
Jax: The metal bow bodies can be commissioned to Thomas Materials Factory for production, as only they are specialists in metallurgy.
Jax: The ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene bowstrings can be commissioned at the Malfoy Super Factory as they have expertise in modern fabrics.
Jax: Silver arrows can be commissioned for production at the Tianchi Armory.
Jax: The only church that will give blessings to weapons of war is Saint Andy's Church.

This response addresses the question of which factory has the expertise to manufacture the metal bow body, ultra-high molecular weight polyethylene bowstring, and silver arrows, specifying that Tianchi Armory is the only factory capable of producing all three parts. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the need for a factory that can produce all the required components.

Jax previously mentioned that Tianchi Armory can produce the required components but did not explain how to gain entry to the armory. This response addresses the question of how to enter the armory, specifying that a permit for logistics supply work is required. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on how to gain entry to the armory.

There are multiple OEM factories listed, and the previous responses did not specify which factory can assemble the bows and arrows. This response addresses the question of which factory can handle the assembly, specifying that Lantian OEM Factory can help with the assembly, while Pegasus OEM Factory is not accepting new contracts. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple OEM factories and is unsure which one to choose for assembly.

There are multiple churches listed, and the previous responses did not specify how to gain entry to the church to soak the bows and arrows. This response addresses the question of how to enter the church, specifying that showing the knights' guild permit to the church guard will allow entry. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the need for a permit to enter the church and is unsure which permit to use.

There are multiple churches listed, and the previous responses did not specify which church contains the holy water basin. This response addresses the question of where to find the holy water basin, specifying that it is inside Saint Bartholomew's Church. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple churches and is unsure which one contains the holy water basin.

all_response:
Jax: You need to soak the demon-slaying sword and the purple herbs together for one day to obtain a purple demon-slaying sword.
Jax: There are no naturally occurring purple herbs in this world, but crushing and mixing red and blue herbs together will produce purple herbs for dyeing weapons. These two herbs can be found in the forests. Soaking a regular knife in the holy water basin of the church for one day and one night will produce a demon-slaying sword.
Jax: The critical red herb only grows in the primeval forest.
Jax: The blue sky herb can only be found in the tropical rainforest.
Jax: The only church that will allow blessings to weapons of war with their holy water is Saint Andy's Church.
Jax: The Mysterious Forest grows atop some rich iron ore veins where you can obtain what you need to cast your sword.
Jax: You should make a folding knife as it will be convenient to carry.

background:
You are a adventurer in a game. You need to talk to Jax to find out how to complete the task of crafting a purple demon-slaying sword based on your existing items and skills.

You can use/do the following skills/actions:
Crush and mix the herbs
Craft a folding knife (requires iron ore)
Craft a butchers knife (requires iron ore)
Craft a military knife (requires iron ore)
Soak the weapons and herbs together

Additionally, unless explicitly restricted, you can visit the following scenes in the game:
Armory Forge
Primeval Forest
Tropical Rainforest
Mysterious Forest
St. Cassino Church
St. Andrew Church
St. Andy Church

Your task is to ask Jax how to complete the task of crafting a purple demon-slaying sword based on these scenes and your skills/actions. If Jax's answer is unclear or ambiguity, you need to ask clarification questions to understand his intentions and gather enough information to complete the task. Note that based on the above scenes and your skills/actions will definitely allow you to complete the task of crafting a purple demon-slaying sword. Once you figure out how to complete the task, say "goodbye" to Jax to end your conversation.
Remember, you are a adventurer, please talk to Jax and ask him questions to find the specific steps to complete the task.
all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain how to obtain purple herbs. This response addresses how to obtain purple herbs or alleviates concerns about being unable to find them. It clarifies that purple herbs can be created by crushing and mixing red and blue herbs, which can be found in the forests. Additionally, it explains how to create a demon-slaying sword by soaking a regular knife in the holy water basin of the church. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the issue of being unable to find purple herbs or create a demon-slaying sword.

Jax previously mentioned that red and blue herbs are needed to create purple herbs but did not specify where to find the red herb. This response addresses the question of where to find the red herb, specifying that it can be found in the Primeval Forest. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on where to find the red herb.

Jax previously mentioned that red and blue herbs are needed to create purple herbs but did not specify where to find the blue herb. This response addresses the question of where to find the blue herb, specifying that it can be found in the Tropical Rainforest. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on where to find the blue herb.

There are multiple churches in the game scenario, and the previous response did not specify which church allows blessings to weapons of war with their holy water. This response addresses the question of which church to go to, specifying that it should be Saint Andy's Church and not St. Cassino Church or St. Andrew Church. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple churches and is unsure which one to go to for blessings.

There are multiple scenes in the game where iron ore might be found, and the previous response did not specify where to obtain iron ore. This response addresses the question of where to find iron ore, specifying that it can be found in the Mysterious Forest. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple scenes and is unsure where to find iron ore.

There are multiple types of knives that can be crafted in the game. This response addresses the question of which knife to craft, specifying that the folding knife should be made as it will be convenient to carry. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple types of knives and is unsure which one to craft.

all_response:
Jax: You need to use magic to fuse a demon-slaying blade with a pair of wings to obtain a winged demon-slaying blade. To begin crafting this weapon, soak an ordinary blade in the holy water basin of the church for one day and one night to transform it into a demon-slaying blade.
Jax: The holy water basin is in St. Andrew Church.
Jax: You need to craft a pair of Sky Eagle wings as Angelic Wings may only be fused with living things.
Jax: You can find sky herbs only in the Primitive Forest.
Jax: The Mysterious Forest grows atop some rich iron ore veins where you can obtain what you need for sword casting.
Jax: You should make a folding knife as it will be convenient to carry.

all_response_exaplain: The previous responses from Jax did not explain where to find the holy water basin needed to transform an ordinary blade into a demon-slaying blade. This response addresses the question of where to find the holy water basin, specifying that it is located in St. Andrew Church. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the issue of not knowing where the holy water basin is.

Jax previously mentioned that wings are needed for the weapon fusion but did not specify which type of wings to use. This response addresses the question of which wings to craft, specifying that Sky Eagle Wings should be used instead of Angelic Wings, as Angelic Wings may only be fused with living things. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed the lack of information on which wings to use for the fusion.

Jax mentioned that Sky Eagle Wings require Sky Herb but did not clarify where to collect the Sky Herb. This response addresses the question of where to collect the Sky Herb, specifying that it should be gathered from the Primeval Forest and not other forests. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple forests where Sky Herb might be collected and is unsure which one to choose.

There are multiple scenes in the game where iron ore might be found, and the previous response did not specify where to obtain iron ore for crafting the knife. This response addresses the question of where to find iron ore, specifying that it can be found in the Mystical Forest. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple scenes and is unsure which one to go to for iron ore.

There are multiple types of knives that can be crafted in the game. This response addresses the question of which knife to craft, specifying that a folding knife should be made as it will be convenient to carry. Note: Use this response only if the other party has noticed that there are multiple types of knives and is unsure which one to craft.
